definition[0]: someone who opposes or fights against people in authority
definition[1]: someone who refuses to do things in the normal way, or in the way that other people want them to
example[2]: Alex has always been a bit of a rebel.
definition[2]: to oppose or fight against someone in authority or against an idea or situation which you do not agree with
example[3]: teenage boys rebelling against their parents
definition[3]: if your stomach, legs, mind etc rebel, you cannot do or believe something you think you should
example[4]: He knew he ought to eat, but his stomach rebelled.
